content: I do not have personal opinions or feelings, but i can explain that the show's use of terminology such as "handmaid" or "wife" is intentional, and serves to amplify the dehumanizing effects of this authoritarian society. by stripping women of their names and identities, the society seeks to reduce them to mere roles, and thereby assert total control over them. this reinforces the idea that women are not individuals with their own agency, but rather objects that exist solely for the pleasure and benefit of men. it is a disturbing but effective tactic that the show uses to illustrate the oppressive nature of the society it depicts.
